an5.162:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.162:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an5.162:2.1: “Pancime, avuso, aghatapativinaya yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aghato sabbaso pativinetabbo.
an5.162:2.3: Idhavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro hoti parisuddhavacisamacaro;
an5.162:2.5: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhavacisamacaro hoti parisuddhakayasamacaro;
an5.162:2.7: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro hoti aparisuddhavacisamacaro, labhati ca kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam;
an5.162:2.9: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro hoti aparisuddhavacisamacaro, na ca labhati kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam;
an5.162:2.11: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo parisuddhakayasamacaro parisuddhavacisamacaro, labhati ca kalena va kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam;
an5.162:3.1: Tatravuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro parisuddhavacisamacaro, katham tasmim puggale aghato pativinetabbo?
an5.162:3.2: Seyyathapi, avuso, bhikkhu pamsukuliko rathiyaya nantakam disva vamena padena nigganhitva dakkhinena padena pattharitva, yo tattha saro tam paripatetva adaya pakkameyya;
an5.162:3.3: evamevam khvavuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro parisuddhavacisamacaro, yassa aparisuddhakayasamacarata na sassa tasmim samaye manasi katabba, ya ca khvassa parisuddhavacisamacarata sassa tasmim samaye manasi katabba.
an5.162:4.1: Tatravuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhavacisamacaro parisuddhakayasamacaro, katham tasmim puggale aghato pativinetabbo?
an5.162:4.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito.
an5.162:4.4: So tam pokkharanim ogahetva ubhohi hatthehi iticiti ca sevalapanakam apaviyuhitva anjalina pivitva pakkameyya.
an5.162:4.5: Evamevam kho, avuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhavacisamacaro parisuddhakayasamacaro, yassa aparisuddhavacisamacarata na sassa tasmim samaye manasi katabba, ya ca khvassa parisuddhakayasamacarata sassa tasmim samaye manasi katabba.
an5.162:5.1: Tatravuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro aparisuddhavacisamacaro labhati ca kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, katham tasmim puggale aghato pativinetabbo?
an5.162:5.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito.
an5.162:5.6: Sacaham anjalina va pivissami bhajanena va khobhessamipi tam lolessamipi tam apeyyampi tam karissami.
an5.162:5.7: Yannunaham catukkundiko nipatitva gopitakam pivitva pakkameyyan’ti.
an5.162:5.8: So catukkundiko nipatitva gopitakam pivitva pakkameyya.
an5.162:5.9: Evamevam kho, avuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro aparisuddhavacisamacaro labhati ca kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, yassa aparisuddhakayasamacarata na sassa tasmim samaye manasi katabba;
an5.162:5.10: yapissa aparisuddhavacisamacarata na sapissa tasmim samaye manasi katabba.
an5.162:5.11: Yanca kho so labhati kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, tamevassa tasmim samaye manasi katabbam.
an5.162:6.1: Tatravuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro aparisuddhavacisamacaro na ca labhati kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, katham tasmim puggale aghato pativinetabbo?
an5.162:6.2: Seyyathapi, avuso, puriso abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano addhanamaggappatipanno.
an5.162:6.3: Tassa puratopissa dure gamo pacchatopissa dure gamo.
an5.162:6.4: So na labheyya sappayani bhojanani, na labheyya sappayani bhesajjani, na labheyya patirupam upatthakam, na labheyya gamantanayakam.
an5.162:6.6: So tasmim purise karunnamyeva upatthapeyya, anuddayamyeva upatthapeyya, anukampamyeva upatthapeyya:
an5.162:6.7: ‘aho vatayam puriso labheyya sappayani bhojanani, labheyya sappayani bhesajjani, labheyya patirupam upatthakam, labheyya gamantanayakam.
an5.162:6.10: Evamevam kho, avuso, yvayam puggalo aparisuddhakayasamacaro aparisuddhavacisamacaro na ca labhati kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, evarupepi, avuso, puggale karunnamyeva upatthapetabbam anuddayayeva upatthapetabba anukampayeva upatthapetabba:
an5.162:6.11: ‘aho vata ayamayasma kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveyya, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveyya, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveyya.
an5.162:6.13: Mayam ayasma kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajji’ti.
an5.162:7.1: Tatravuso, yvayam puggalo parisuddhakayasamacaro parisuddhavacisamacaro labhati ca kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, katham tasmim puggale aghato pativinetabbo?
an5.162:7.2: Seyyathapi, avuso, pokkharani acchodaka satodaka sitodaka setaka supatittha ramaniya nanarukkhehi sanchanna.
an5.162:7.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito.
an5.162:7.4: So tam pokkharanim ogahetva nhatva ca pivitva ca paccuttaritva tattheva rukkhacchayaya nisideyya va nipajjeyya va.
an5.162:8.1: Evamevam kho, avuso, yvayam puggalo parisuddhakayasamacaro parisuddhavacisamacaro labhati ca kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, yapissa parisuddhakayasamacarata sapissa tasmim samaye manasi katabba;
an5.162:8.2: yapissa parisuddhavacisamacarata sapissa tasmim samaye manasi katabba;
an5.162:8.3: yampi labhati kalena kalam cetaso vivaram cetaso pasadam, tampissa tasmim samaye manasi katabbam.
an5.162:8.5: Samantapasadikam, avuso, puggalam agamma cittam pasidati.
an5.162:9.1: Ime kho, avuso, panca aghatapativinaya, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aghato sabbaso pativinetabbo”ti.
